title: Expanding our tiles
content:
Well, we all know and hate the tile limit Keen sets us don't we? Well, while poking around Dangerous Dave I managed to locate its tileinfo, and that of Shadow Kinights. Now, that of Shadow Knights is very much longer than that of Dave's So I think to myself, 'If I can make the tileinfo file external, than Dave will run with as many tiles as SK..."

So here it is; a short level using SK tiles, i.e TWICE the number Dave usues. [url=http://www.net2ftp.com/index.php?ftpserver=toxicsheep.com&ftpserverport=21&username=levellord&password_encrypted=30686E3033737433683376696C&language=en&skin=blue&ftpmode=automatic&passivemode=no&sslconnect=no&viewmode=list&sort=&sortorder=&directory=/htdocs&entry=Shadav.zip&state=downloadfile]www.net2ftp.com/index.php...wnloadfile[/url]

Now, whats the point of this you ask? Well Dave's and SK's tileinfo is identical to Keens...

Now I'm not saying I've managed it, lets just say I'm close. Once the tileinfo file is external. well, the tile limit is set by memory alone, usually at around 1'000 tiles, given the normal Keen graphics...

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Expanding our tiles
content: April fools?[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Re: Expanding our tiles
content:
Well, now that this is most assuredly over;

APRIL FOOLS!

Ha! TRhat'll teach you to convince me Keen Dreams graphics can be edited for a prank! HA!

I have NO idea how to externalize KEEN tileinfo files, even though doing so WOULD give us more tiles.

Go ask Andy, he knows about this stuff.

title: Haha!!
content:
April fools jokes only count on April 1st! Since you said "April Fools" after April 1st, it doesn't count, so now you HAVE to figure this out for real!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] -Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Haha!!
content:
